```{r}

landUseDF <- read.csv("../data/data_analysis/assignment_07/feldfruechte_cleaned_for_fs.csv", 
                      header = T, sep = ";", dec = ".")[,4:13]

dfNames <- names(landUseDF)
dep <- dfNames[1]
vars <- dfNames[-1]
#selected <- c("Wintergerste","Kartoffeln","Roggen_Wintermenggetreide","Winterraps")
selected <- c()

source("assignment_07/fwdFt.R")

repeat{
  bestVariable <- forward_feature_selection(landUseDF, 
                                            dep = dep, vars = vars, 
                                            selected_vars = selected)
  if(is.logical(bestVariable)) break()
  selected <- c(selected, bestVariable)
}

```
